name: Nith Realms
description:
The Game


Andros lived a good life until tragedy struck his family. In consequence, he committed terrible acts of vengeance and lived out the rest of his days in misery. After death, he wakes up in the Nith with no recollection of his troubles and an opportunity to return to his life. He is given a mission to liberate the Nith from its terrible rulers and only then will he be able to return to his life.

Nith Realms is a third-person RPG action-adventure game with free-flow combat and elemental abilities. The player will have to defeat powerful bosses and take on dangerous environments in order to obtain the all-powerful elements to take back the Nith. The player will have to travel through the vast Realms and face all kinds of dangers in a quest to liberate the Nith and get back to reality.

Key Features


  • Frenetic free-flow combat
  • Unique boss fights
  • Elemental Powers
  • Multiple Realms

Project made for the B.A. in Interactive Product Design degree of U-tad, University of Technology, Arts and Design.
